title: Wall Street Breakfast June 6: What Moved Markets This Week
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
This is a revamped roundtable format hosted by Nathaniel E. Baker and featuring:

Aaron Task, VP Contributor Content and co-host Seeking Alpha's Alpha Trader podcast, 

Brad Olesen, VP News

Steve Alpher, Managing Editor News, co-host Alpha Trader

Content Segments (Spotify users can click on the timestamp to link to the start of the segment):

Intro: another bullish week for stocks. Forget FOMO, this is POMO: Panic of Missing Out (0:56)

Zoom earnings (3:23)

Warren Buffett versus Robin Hood (5:36)

The rally is broad. What can trip it up? (9:24)

Seeking Alpha Content That Caught Our Eye This Week (12:35)

Aaron: It Is Not Too Late To Buy Nvidia Stock, by Andres Cardenal

Brad: Coty Jumps On Kim Kardashian Collaboration Discussion

Steve: The Bond Crash May Have Begun, by Michael Gayed

Nat: Don't Get Too Comfortable, The Next Wave Is Coming, by Victor Dergunov

The IPO market is back (18:11)

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
